id.description: ID of the voicemail or call recording.

call_id.description: ID of the voice call the voicemail or call recording belongs to.

external_id.description: ID of the voicemail or call recording on the provider side (Twilio, etc...).

url.description: Voicemail or call recording direct access URL.

duration.description: Duration in seconds of the voicemail or call recording.

type.description: Whether this is a voicemail or a call recording.

created_datetime.description: When the voicemail or call recording was created.

deleted_datetime.description: When the voicemail or call recording was deleted, if deleted.

deleted_by_user_id.description: Which agent deleted the voicemail or call recording, if deleted.

error_code.description: Reason why the URL could not be provided.
